block.p: American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Optioned LHP Jeremy Sowers to Buffalo (IL). Recalled RHP Matt Miller from Buffalo. SEATTLE MARINERS--Activated RHP Jeff Weaver from the 15-day DL. Placed RHP John Huber on the 15-day DL, retroactive to June 7.

National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Activated 3B Chad Tracy from the 15-day DL. Optioned INF-OF Robby Hammock to Tucson (PCL). HOUSON ASTROS--Recalled LHP Mark McLemore from Round Rock (PCL). Assigned C Humberto Quintero outright to Round Rock. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Recalled1B-OF James Loney from Las Vegas (PCL). Designated OF Brady Clark for assignment.
TENNESSEE TITANS--Agreed to terms with CB Kelly Herndon on a three-year contract.

Assigned C Humberto Quintero outright to Round Rock. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Recalled1B-OF James Loney from Las Vegas (PCL). Designated OF Brady Clark for assignment.
TENNESSEE TITANS--Agreed to terms with CB Kelly Herndon on a three-year contract.
